description: Browse and search the Hugeicons library to quickly find the right icons by name or tag. Get platform-specific usage guidance to integrate icons seamlessly in your app, site, or design system. Retrieve exact Unicode glyphs for each icon and style to ensure consistent rendering across platforms.

capabilities.name: list_icons
capabilities.description: Get a list of all available Hugeicons icons

capabilities.name: search_icons
capabilities.description: Search for icons by name or tags. Use commas to search for multiple icons (e.g. 'home, notification, settings')

capabilities.name: get_platform_usage
capabilities.description: Get platform-specific usage instructions for Hugeicons

capabilities.name: get_icon_glyphs
capabilities.description: Get all glyphs (unicode characters) for a specific icon across all available styles

capabilities.name: get_icon_glyph_by_style
capabilities.description: Get the glyph (unicode character) for a specific icon with a particular style
